name: Bubble Breaker (itch)
description:
Bubble Breaker is one of the best match-two puzzle games of all time! Once you pop, you can’t stop!

Tap on two or more adjacent bubbles to make them burst, try to score as many points as possible!
FEATURES
Addictive match-two puzzle game
Two different game modes
Save and load your game scenario!
Fun game for all ages!
Stunning effects, excellent soundtrack, relaxing sounds.
HOW TO PLAY
Just tap two or more bubbles of  the same color!
TIPS ON SCORING
Remember just two rules below:
1. The more bubbles you pop, the more scores you will get!
2. Try to clear all bubbles, you will get a lot of bonus
------------------------------------
Score = bubbles*bubbles*6
Get bonus when less than 21 remained!
Bonus = 2200 - bubbles*bubbles*5

Install instructions
1 - Download the zip file
2 - Unpack the zip file
3 - Launch "Bubble Breaker.exe"
